name: Puzzle-iso
description:
You're a soul that needs to find the way to Heaven. 

TRACE YOUR PATH TO PARADISE IN 4 PUZZLE LEVELS!

-- CONTROLS --

Arrows - Walk

Right click to select answer boxes

-- CREDITS --

--Programming/Sprites/Art--

PerihLeaff

--Music--

Lonley

--Special Thanks--

Artixelp Games

Tsuki

Fullscreen HIGLY recommended.

Listen to the OST here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLV8IzupTsO4msMOTg0dG7L_VweiudjOhk

-- TIPS --

Level 1: Maybe you should take a look at how many sides the symbols have.

Level 2: If you can't display both of the signs at the same time, you should look for a shortcut.

Level 3: Really, i don't know how to give a better hint for this one. just read the sign.

Boss: Read the books and the paper, maybe writing it down in somewhere should help.

Game made for The You Can Do It Jam!
